20101231220219.000|20101231220221.000|TR0|

20101231220231.000|20101231220233.000|TR0|it started overnight last night and it 
20101231220233.000|20101231220235.000|TR0|started even in the dark in parts of 
20101231220235.000|20101231220237.000|TR0|Arkansas.  And in the dark, tornadoes are 
20101231220237.000|20101231220239.000|TR0|hard -- are, obviously, harder to see. 
20101231220239.000|20101231220241.000|TR0|Sometimes the delay getting some of the 
20101231220241.000|20101231220243.000|TR0|warnings out, although this was not the 
20101231220243.000|20101231220245.000|TR0|case.  But you don't hear the sirens.  
20101231220245.000|20101231220247.000|TR0|You're not awake. You need a NOAA weather 
20101231220247.000|20101231220249.000|TR0|radio for storms in the dark.
20101231220249.000|20101231220251.000|TR0|

20101231220253.000|20101231220255.000|TR0|through Illinois into Indiana and then 
20101231220255.000|20101231220257.000|TR0|finally into places like Tennessee, 
20101231220257.000|20101231220300.000|TR0|Mississippi and Alabama.

20101231220330.000|20101231220332.000|TR0|moved off into Illinois.

20101231220340.000|20101231220342.000|TR0|clash is right down here -- Mississippi,

20101231220348.000|20101231220350.000|TR0|this, but the potential is there.  Tornado

20101231220354.000|20101231220356.000|TR0|
20101231220356.000|20101231220359.000|TR0|If you hear the sirens go off and if you 
20101231220359.000|20101231220401.000|TR0|know a storm is coming near you, stay away 
20101231220401.000|20101231220403.000|TR0|from the windows.  Get inside.  Go to the 
20101231220403.000|20101231220405.000|TR0|lowest level, if you can.  And if it's not

20101231225829.000|20101231225831.000|TR0|demonstrates the contempt and bravado of 
20101231225831.000|20101231225833.000|TR0|an experienced killer.  The 
20101231225833.000|20101231225835.000|TR0|self-proclaimed "Crossbow Cannibal" 
20101231225835.000|20101231225837.000|TR0|showing off his murder weapon.  Just a few 
20101231225837.000|20101231225839.000|TR0|hours later, the footage from "The Daily 
20101231225839.000|20101231225842.000|TR0|Mirror" shows him casually carrying bin 
20101231225842.000|20101231225844.000|TR0|bags out of his flats.
20101231225844.000|20101231225846.000|TR0|
20101231225846.000|20101231225848.000|TR0|(on camera):  CCTV cameras in and around 
20101231225848.000|20101231225850.000|TR0|the building where Steven Griffiths lived 
20101231225850.000|20101231225852.000|TR0|even captured the moments that he murdered 
20101231225852.000|20101231225854.000|TR0|Suzanne Blamires.  Had not admitted the 
20101231225854.000|20101231225856.000|TR0|guilt, those pictures which are too 
20101231225856.000|20101231225858.000|TR0|graphic for us to show would have left a 
20101231225858.000|20101231225900.000|TR0|jury in no doubt of his guilt.
20101231225900.000|20101231225902.000|TR0|
20101231225902.000|20101231225904.000|TR0|Last week, Griffiths admitted killing 
20101231225904.000|20101231225906.000|TR0|Shelley Armitage and Suzanne Blamires and 
20101231225906.000|20101231225908.000|TR0|Susan Rushworth.
20101231225908.000|20101231225910.000|TR0|
20101231225910.000|20101231225912.000|TR0|It was the discovery of the CCTV footage 
20101231225912.000|20101231225914.000|TR0|which led to Griffiths being caught.  A 
20101231225914.000|20101231225916.000|TR0|caretaker reviewing the pictures saw him 
20101231225916.000|20101231225918.000|TR0|attacking Suzanne.  A massive police 
20101231225918.000|20101231225920.000|TR0|operation was launched.  Griffiths was 
20101231225920.000|20101231225922.000|TR0|arrested and confessed.  He was described 
20101231225922.000|20101231225924.000|TR0|by the judge as a wicked and monstrous 
20101231225924.000|20101231225926.000|TR0|killer.  These pictures show just why he 
20101231225926.000|20101231225928.000|TR0|chose those words.
20101231225928.000|20101231225930.000|TR0|
20101231225930.000|20101231225932.000|TR0|Tom Barton, ITV News, Bradford.
